snippet: Judge Pollak, who was recruited to the NAACP Legal Defense Fund, worked on Brown v. Board of Education and later argued successfully on behalf of convicted Freedom Riders before the Supreme Court.
abstract: Louis H Pollak, civil rights advocate and federal judge, dies at age 89.
